resources.string: This medieval market square is one of the largest markets in Europe, with two largest city halls in Poland
One of the biggest musical fountain in the Europe located in the historic Wroclaw exhibition ground
There are 350+ small figures spread all over the city are symbol of the Orange Alternative (Polish anti-communist movement)
The tallest building in Poland in the category of height to roof and category of highest floor
The Gothic town hall built from the 13th can be found at the center of the city’s Market Square
One of the best burger in the town located near the Market Square
Great Restaurant at the center of the Market Square serving traditional polish dumplings
The oldest zoo in Poland (opened in 1965) with first in Poland Africarium-Oceanarium
Group of islands on the Oder River within the Wroclaw Old Town
